attributes.action: Invite  Alan Bates to consider being the next Chairman of  The Post Office.
attributes.additional_details: Alan Bates has an appropriate background for this position and he would be an excellent Chairman.
attributes.background: The post of  Chairman of  The Post Office is currently vacant. We would like this government to ask him to fill this vacancy.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments to public offices.
